messages.title: TIME FOR A CHANGE
messages.content: We've been let down by a succession of governments for too long

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP recognizes the benefits of limited, controlled immigration. Proposes an Australian type points system to fill skill gaps in the UK job market, requiring that those coming to work in the UK have a job to go to, must speak English and have accommodation agreed prior to their arrival, with no amnesty on illegal immigration. Those seeking entry into the UK would need to have Health Insurance for five years and make Tax and National Insurance contributions for five consecutive years before claiming UK benefits.

issues.brexitEurope: It is time we left the EU and took back control of our borders
issues.immigration: UNLIMITED IMMIGRATION MEANS British jobs being offered to Non British workers, Millions in taxpayers money for housing benefit and other welfare payments, Building 1000 new homes every week for 20 years, Huge new workload for doctors and teachers

housing.content: Millions in taxpayers money for housing benefit and other welfare payments

contactInformation.address: Printed and published by UKIP, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot, TQ12 9BG.

images.caption: Portrait of a smiling man with the UKIP logo in the corner
